title: 3v3 not currently available
body: Does anyone know why 3v3 has been disabled? I played about 2 hrs ago, just come back for another game before work and it is greyed out and says 'not currently available'

replies.body:
Thank you for your reply. Unfortunately that does not help. Although I did want to play ranked 3v3, the whole game mode is unavailable. I can't play bind pick to practise or play for fun whilst ranked is down!

On another note, why has ranked been restricted to specific timing? I work from 7-9am and 3-7pm every day. This means that I can only play ranked for 3 hours each day, if I start as soon as I get home, and that's if I stay up until 11pm (which I don't as I have to leave at 6am for work) Will this be changing in the New Year or is it a season long thing?

Ranked Team matches roll on a specific schedule depending on it being a weekday or weekend.  Check out the [ranked team](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209964886-Ranked-Teams-Schedule) guide for the full schedule for your server.  Hope that helps clear things up!
